text:
NAFA Campus 3 is a very clean auditorium for performance near the Bugis area. All the staff are friendly and helpful, and assisted my team in preparing for our performance. It's a good place to have performance! And the VIP room for after-performance party is clean and cosy too

However, their lightings could be improved, not that bright/high-quality

Attended free concert by NAFA and SCO last night. Dynamic performance of many contemporary music that is superb. Enjoy the encore 火車toccata especially, full of drive n drama. Think conductor did a great job!  Wish that in the future, concert like this can be on the live stream like YouTube or Facebook live so that more public get to enjoy, as I know ticket was sold out very fast n there s people who like to come but couldn't get ticket.
Terrible composition department. Goh Toh Chai (无多才) teaches you to write disgusting music no one wants to listen to.

Situated at Art School hotspot with the old Jewish quarters of middle road Nanyang academy was once situated in Mount Sophia. This structure was designed by veteran Architect Lui Thai Ker famous for the designing (Brasilia style) HDB corridor aparment slab.

Heard they have singing class
I’m still checking
